items.title: CC Lab Officially Established at XJTLU
items.excerpt: Dr. Kevin Chan joins XJTLU as Assistant Professor and establishes the CC Lab focusing on structural bioinformatics and molecular dynamics.

items.title: Deep Learning Paper Published in Nature Machine Intelligence
items.excerpt: Our comprehensive review on deep learning for drug-target interaction prediction is now published.

items.title: Single-Cell RNA Sequencing Study in Cell
items.excerpt: New research reveals novel cell types in disease using advanced sequencing techniques.

items.title: Graph Neural Networks Research Published
items.excerpt: Our work on molecular property prediction using graph neural networks appears in JCIM.

items.title: Nature Methods Publishes ML Genomics Study
items.excerpt: Research on interpretable machine learning approaches for genomics analysis now available.
